violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: odow
discussion.text:
[noblock]

## About

This package wraps a commercial binary as a JLL to ease installation of KNITRO.jl.

We have developed it in collaboration and with the approval of the commercial developers.

The `KNITRO_jll` name is their request: https://github.com/jump-dev/KNITRO_jll.jl/pull/1#issuecomment-3116713607

## Precedent

There are two existing precedents for this package.

https://github.com/jump-dev/KNITRO_jll.jl is to https://github.com/jump-dev/KNITRO.jl 

what

https://github.com/jump-dev/Gurobi_jll.jl is to https://github.com/jump-dev/Gurobi.jl (https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/105698)

and 

https://github.com/jump-dev/Xpress_jll.jl is to https://github.com/jump-dev/Xpress.jl (https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/103121)
